Mike Pence  called for stripping Planned Parenthood, which he referred to as the "largest abortion provider in America,""  of federal funding.  Every American knows in their heart, this is the greatest nation on earth because we acknowledge the God-given right to liberty, the pursuit of happiness and the unalienable right to life,   Mike Pence  said. Space Center in Houston. Today is the 25th anniversary of the Challenger accident.  Mike Pence , considered by some a possible GOP Presidential candidate in 2012, has ruled out a run for the White House.  In the choice between seeking national office and serving Indiana in some capacity, we choose Indiana,   Mike Pence  said in a letter to supporters first reported Thursday by the Indianapolis Star. "We will not seek the Republican nomination for president in 2012.""  href="http://www.washingtonpost.com/wp- dyn/content/article/2011/01/27/AR2011012708191.html?hpid=moreheadlines" target="new"> The Washington Post>>
